DataElement.preferredName: Subject Activity Group Reuse Template Study Activity Comment ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A collection of activities from a global library that would be performed on a common subject at approximately the same time. EXAMPLE(S): Clinic visit during which a physical exam, a blood test, and a substance administration occur. Telephone contact during which temperature, blood pressure and adverse events are reported. Recording multiple observation results in a diary. Additional description of the activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.:Any number of entities (members) considered as a unit.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material.
